sentence: Tuesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 7,158.43.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.53 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 5.78 to 1 ratio.
There were 465 advancers and 2686 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 5 stocks reached a 52 week high and 174 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -3.78% for the day; a total of -266.92 points.
Wynn Resorts, Limited ( WYNN ) had the largest percent change down (-7.87%) while Tesla, Inc. ( TSLA ) had the largest percent change gain rising .34%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -3.1% for the day; a total of -799.36 points.
Caterpillar, Inc. ( CAT ) had the largest percent change down (-6.93%) while Procter & Gamble Company (The) ( PG ) had the largest percent change gain rising -.01%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
